version_description:
- New Improved Desert Scene
- Added Aerial Camera View
- Fixed Trees Getting Clipped by Water
- Fixed broken connection on American Midwest scene

- New Improved Desert Scene
- Added Aerial Camera View
- Fixed Trees Getting Clipped by Water
- Fixed broken connection on American Midwest scene

- New Improved Ports of Call Scene
- Improved Rain Affect + Working Windshield Wipers
- Longer Trains
- Many Bug Fixes

- New User Interface (Old one still available in Options)

- Build Custom Environments for your Trains

- Lots of bug fixes & performance improvements
